response.job_title: Mechanical Engineer - National University of Colombia
response.summary:
Mechanical Engineer of the University Universidad Nacional de Colombia. Knowledge on CAE simulation, CAD Design, Intellectual property, Programming in compiled and interpreted languages, SQL and NoSQL Database processing, Aritificial Intelligence applications and Software development. Currently I’m working as an institutional reacher with the development of engineering projects applied to cardiovascular medicine and high complexity specialties, as a co-reseacher in the project “Artificial Intelligence (AI) applied to the diagnosis of cardiovascular diseases by cardiac sound registers”. 


My research interests include the conjunction of CAE simulation and Data Science, mathematical models in engineering in synergy with AI and physics-based simulation to improve the product design process through software, IoT and PCB Applications, 3D/2D generative design, and deep learning-based CAD/CAE frameworks, real-time pre-processing signals/systems, together with the integration of ML, and analytics technique, optimization and performance evaluation problems, and the solution and transfer learning of complex systems or models.
response.skills: Software CAE, Programación, Diseño asistido por ordenador (CAD), Inspección, Industria aeroespacial, Inglés, Ingeniería asistida por ordenador, Sector automovilístico, ingenieria de manufactura
